response.overview: Engrudo portrays the graphic explosion of social outburst that surprised the entire Chilean society on October 18, 2019. Filmmakers, artists and citizens appropriate the public space, intervening and creating with great intensity. The diverse crowd that tries to communicate their desires and demands through this medium, street art, has to resist repression and censorship in a transcendental moment for the country's history.
response.title: Engrudo
